data.title: Boozman, Cotton, Crawford hold listening session with steel industry figures
data.meta_description: JONESBORO -- The ability to power the growing steel industry in Mississippi County took the spotlight Tuesday during a gathering on the Arkansas State University campus that included three members of the state's congressional delegation who also heard concerns about infrastructure, housing and international trade.
data.text: JONESBORO -- The ability to power the growing steel industry in Mississippi County took the spotlight Tuesday during a gathering on the Arkansas State University campus that included three members of the state's congressional delegation who also heard concerns about infrastructure, housing and international trade.
